set_ship_text.name: Invincible
set_ship_text.hailtext: Remember, Artemis, we are really a destroyer using a low frequency energy signature to appear as a dreadnought.

set_ship_text.name: Indefatigable
set_ship_text.hailtext: Artemis, our disguise will fail if our shields take any damage at all.

set_ship_text.name: Indomitable
set_ship_text.hailtext: If our shields are damaged they will know we are just a destroyer in disguise.

set_ship_text.name: Agamemnon
set_ship_text.hailtext: Don't go crazy, Artemis. We are just an escort using a low frequency energy signature to appear as a battleship.

set_ship_text.name: Apollo
set_ship_text.hailtext: Use us carefully, Artemis. We are just an escort that gives a battleship sensor image.

set_ship_text.name: Mercury
set_ship_text.hailtext: We must keep up the ruse as long as possible. If the enemy suspects this is a trap they will withdraw and crush out fleet at Epsilon Pegasi.

set_ship_text.name: Q12
set_ship_text.desc: Captain Lady LaRala has been knighted by the Queen.

set_ship_text.name: Q15
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Library Computer: Captain Lady Olnah has been knighted by the Queen.

event.name: Fleet Message 1
event.incoming_comms_text: The fleet has departed for Epsilon Pegasi. Good luck defending the Sirius Sector. We will report again in fifteen minutes.

event.name: Fleet Message 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Our fleet is approaching Epsilon Pegasi. Keep them busy in Sirius Sector for another fourteen minutes.

event.name: Fleet Message 3
event.incoming_comms_text: We are attacking Epsilon Pegasi now. Congratulations, you succeeded! If you can hold Sirius Sector another ten minutes we will be there to help you.

event.name: Fleet Message 4
event.incoming_comms_text: The humans are attacking Epsilon Pegasi! All units withdraw to defensive positions immediately!

event.name: Reveal Invincible Front
event.incoming_comms_text: We've been discovered, Artemis! They know we're just a destroyer!

event.name: Reveal Invincible Rear
event.incoming_comms_text: We've been discovered, Artemis! They know we're just a destroyer!

event.name: Reveal Indefatigable Front
event.incoming_comms_text: The jig is up, Artemis! We've been found out!

event.name: Reveal Indefatigable Rear
event.incoming_comms_text: The jig is up, Artemis! We've been found out!

event.name: Reveal Indomitable Front
event.incoming_comms_text: They hit our shields, Artemis! Our identity is revealed! What should we do now?

event.name: Reveal Indomitable Rear
event.incoming_comms_text: They hit our shields, Artemis! Our identity is revealed! What should we do now?

event.name: Reveal Agamemnon Front
event.incoming_comms_text: The enemy scanned us, Artemis! If they discover our trap then our fleet at Epsilon Pegasi will be destroyed!

event.name: Reveal Agamemnon Rear
event.incoming_comms_text: The enemy scanned us, Artemis! If they discover our trap then our fleet at Epsilon Pegasi will be destroyed!

event.name: Reveal Apollo Front
event.incoming_comms_text: We've been discovered, Artemis! We need to be careful or the enemy will know they have been tricked!

event.name: Reveal Apollo Rear
event.incoming_comms_text: We've been discovered, Artemis! We need to be careful or the enemy will know they have been tricked!

event.name: Reveal Mercury Front
event.incoming_comms_text: We've been discovered, Artemis! The enemy may become suspicious!

event.name: Reveal Mercury Rear
event.incoming_comms_text: We've been discovered, Artemis! The enemy may become suspicious!

event.name: Station cautious 1
event.incoming_comms_text: Be careful with those disguised ships, Artemis. One hit to their shields destroys their disguises!

event.name: Station cautious 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Now two of your ships have lost their disguises. Soon the enemy may suspect the Sirius feint.

event.name: Enemy Suspicious 1
event.incoming_comms_text: This is suspicious. Three Earth capital ships were mere picket ships in disguise.

event.name: Enemy Suspicious 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Perhaps the Earth ships in Sirius Sector are a feint. The humans may have set a trap at Epsilon Pegasi.

event.name: Enemy Suspicious 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Another disguised Earth ship! If we find one more we should regroup at Epsilon Pegasi.

event.name: Enemy Suspicious 4
event.incoming_comms_text: This must be a trap! All ships regroup at Epsilon Pegasi!

big_message.title: VICTORY!
big_message.subtitle1: Your Sirius Feint distracted the enemy and our fleet won!
big_message.subtitle2: You will be remembered as heroes!

big_message.title: DEFEAT
big_message.subtitle1: The enemy detected the Sirius feint too soon
big_message.subtitle2: and the main fleet was defeated at Epsilon Pegasi.

event.name: Continue After Exposure
event.incoming_comms_text: It's too late! The humans have broken through at Epsilon Pegasi! We must kill them all or die trying!

big_message.title: DEFEAT
big_message.subtitle2: and the main fleet was defeated.
